channel.title: Qemu on Bevisy's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in Qemu on Bevisy's Blogs

item.title: Compile qemu on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Compile qemu on Ubuntu 20.04 下载源码 git clone https://git.qemu.org/git/qemu.git cd qemu git submodule init git submodule update --recursive 编译安装 ./configure make 问题 # ERROR: glib-2.48 gthread-2.0 is required to compile QEMU $ sudo apt install -y libglib2.0-dev # ERROR: pixman >= 0.21.8 not present. # Please install the pixman devel package. $ sudo apt install -y libpixman-1-dev
